title: proof that riot bans people for no reason (read inside)
body:
hello guys

ive been recently permabanned by riot for using third party programs

they accused me of cheating, while I've never ever used any sort of script or third party program.

however, riot didnt care, and they still permabanned me even though this is the first time i have ever been punished in league, proving that not only they dont give any proof of their claims, but they also dont care if they are right or not. just because they think i have used scripts, they ban me, and this is disgusting.

i have sent a ticket to their support, and im still really pissed that this happened, because im a very honest player, and you can check my match history as proof
